query:
SELECT
step_name,
Count (Serial_num) STARTS,
 Round(sum(CASE WHEN Pass_fail = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) PASS,
 Count(serial_num) - Round(sum(CASE WHEN pass_fail = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) FAIL,
 Round((sum(CASE WHEN Pass_fail = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/Count(serial_num))*100,1) yield

from
 PHASE2.ROSA_FUNCTIONAL ROSA_FUNCTIONAL

where test_end_time >to_date('20151128 063000','YYYYMMDD HH24MISS')
and test_end_time <=to_date('20151129 063000','YYYYMMDD HH24MISS')
and state= 'C'

GROUP BY step_name


UNION ALL

SELECT
step_name,
Count (Serial_num) STARTS,
 Round(sum(CASE WHEN Pass_fail = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) PASS,
 Count(serial_num) - Round(sum(CASE WHEN pass_fail = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) FAIL,
 Round((sum(CASE WHEN Pass_fail = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/Count(serial_num))*100,1) yield

from
 PHASE2.MTLI_TEST MTLI_TEST

where test_end_time >to_date('20151128 063000','YYYYMMDD HH24MISS')
and test_end_time <=to_date('20151129 063000','YYYYMMDD HH24MISS')
and state= 'C'
and channel= '1'
and test_temp= '20'

GROUP BY step_name

UNION ALL

SELECT
system_id,
Count (Serial_num) STARTS,
 Round(sum(CASE WHEN Pass_fail = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) PASS,
 Count(serial_num) - Round(sum(CASE WHEN pass_fail = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) FAIL,
 Round((sum(CASE WHEN Pass_fail = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/Count(serial_num))*100,1) yield

 FROM PHASE2.TOSA_FUNCTIONAL TOSA_FUNCTIONAL

where test_end_time >to_date('20151128 063000','YYYYMMDD HH24MISS')
and test_end_time <=to_date('20151129 063000','YYYYMMDD HH24MISS')
and state= 'C'

GROUP BY system_id
